text: Netball at the Pacific Games (previously known as the South Pacific Games) has been played by women's netball teams from Pacific nations since 1963. It is the oldest Oceania regional tournament. == Pacific Games == {|class=wikitable style="text-align:left" |- ! rowspan="2" style="padding:1px;"| ! rowspan="2"|Year ! rowspan="2" width=88|Host city ! colspan="4"|Final placings !!rowspan="2" width=20 |Refs |- ! width=160|Gold !!
